thread.title: Hertz Revenue Down On Lower US Business
thread.title_full: Hertz Revenue Down On Lower US Business | Airwise News

author: Reuters
title: Hertz Revenue Down On Lower US Business
text:
Car rental company Hertz reported a 5 percent decline in quarterly revenue, hurt by a strong dollar and lower car rental volume in the United States. Hertz, which received more than two-thirds of its car rental revenue from airport services in 2014, has been affected by the strong dollar that made travel to the United States pricier for tourists.
The company also closed about 200 off-airport locations in the second quarter, as part of its efforts to focus on more profitable locations and to save USD$300 million by March.
Revenue fell to USD$2.69 billion from USD$2.83 billion in the quarter ended June 30.
Net income fell to USD$23 million, from USD$72 million a year earlier.
(Reuters)
